segments.text: Certainly . I prefer the winter and I love plum blossoms much more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's snowing heavily . What about taking a walk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Seeking plum blossoms with stepping on the snow ? That's a good idea . Let's go !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take care ! Don't slip down to the ground .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got it . I like the sound of stepping on the snow very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you smell the sweet scent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It should be the fragrance of plum blossoms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fragrance of plum blossoms comes from the hard coldness .
segments.speaker: S1
